entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #Trump deliberately embarrassed and demeaned a nurse for telling the truth.

He doesn’t give a crap about nurses.

His only goal is to honor himself.

That is a difficult task when one has no goddamn honor.

#TrumpLiesAmericansDie #TaskForce
#coronavirus  #ThursdayThoughts #MAGA
